entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 10 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 10 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
